main event: A bright light was sighted in the sky over Richmond, Virginia on December 25, 1950, making rapid movements and emitting small lights.
interesting points: The object was observed twice at different times,It appeared as a bright light hovering in the sky,Ground witnesses observed the object through binoculars,No definitive identification could be made,The object's movements did not match any known aircraft.
sighted object: a bright light in the sky
